content: Hey @WG-async-foundations -- my current meeting is running over, but does anyone have any updates this week?
Not much from me - doing a quick non-async-await error message. If there's any poor error async messages feel free to throw them my way.

"expected type impl Foo (opaque type), found type impl Foo (opaque type) " - just trying to get this error message to return file/line number of the definition sites of the opaque types so things are less confusing. #63167
@Giles Cope note that this is the book meeting
@nikomatsakis I don't have any updates to give here, other than that I still have a WIP PR for the useful-workarounds section
Sorry again, always tripped up by that one! Hope the book is going well, I'm really eager to read the bits that have not been written yet.
